title: Teamwork
data: I have worked in Teams of various sizes across multiple Orgs. Most of the time in close contact, as if I
would share an office with them.

title: Software Testing
data: Testing is critical for every non trivial software and therefore best implemented as early as
possible. Robust testing enables a bugfree Application.

title: Agile Methods
data: I am accustomed to work in an agile environment and had the opportunity to guide other teams in this regard.
I am of the opinion that this is one of the best methods for backend developing.

title: New Technologies
data: New Technologies, like currently LLMs, should always be evaluated and integrated into the Product or Toolchain, if useful of cause.
